602:0: 11 98. buddhaṃ subhūti paripṛcchati vādicandraṃ kyantantarāyu bhaviṣyanti guṇe ratānām|
602:1: bahu antarāyu bhaviṣyanti bhaṇāti śāsta tatu alpamātra parikīrtayiṣyāmi tāvat||
602:3: 99. pratibhāna neka vividhāni upapadyiṣyanti likhamāna prajña imu pāramitā jinānām|
602:4: yuta śīghra vidyuta yathā parihāyiṣyanti akaritva artha jagatī imu mārakarma||
602:6: 100. kāṅkṣā ca keṣaci bhaviṣyati bhāṣamāṇe na mamātra nāma parikīrtitu nāyakena|
602:7: na ca jāti bhūmi parikīrtitu nāpi gotraṃ na ca so śruṇiṣyati kṣipiṣyati mārakarma||
602:9: 101. evaṃ ta mūlamapahāya ajānamāno śākhāpalāśa parieṣayiṣyanti mūḍhāḥ|
602:10: hastiṃ labhitva yatha hastipadaṃ gaveṣe tatha prajñapāramita śrutva sūtrānta eṣet||
602:12: 102. yatha bhojanaṃ śatarasaṃ labhiyāna kaścit mārgeṣu ṣaṣṭiku labhitva sa bhojanāgryam|
602:17: 103. satkārakāma bhaviṣyanti ca lābhakāmāḥ sāpekṣacitta kulasaṃstavasaṃprayuktāḥ|
602:18: choritva dharma kariṣyanti adharmakāryaṃ patha hitva utpathagatā ima mārakarma||
602:20: 104. ye cāpi tasmi samaye imu dharma śreṣṭhaṃ śruṇanāya chandika utpādayiṣyanti śraddhām|
602:21: te dharmabhāṇaka viditvana kāryayuktaṃ premāpanīta gamiṣyanti sudurmanāśca||
602:23: 105. imi mārakarma bhaviṣyanti ya tasmi kāle anye ca neka vividhā bahu antarāyā|
602:24: yehī samākulikṛtā bahu bhikṣu tatra prajñāya pāramita etu na dhārayanti||
602:26: 106. ye te bhavanti ratanā ya anarghaprāptā te durlabhā bahupratyarthika nityakālam|
602:27: emeva prajñavarapāramitā jinānāṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ baddupadravaṃ ca||
602:29: 107. navayānaprasthita sa sattva parīttabuddhiḥ ya imaṃ durlābhu dharmaratanaṃ parāpuṇanti|
602:30: māro'tra utsuku bhaviṣyati antarāye buddhā daśaddiśi parigrahasaṃprayuktāḥ||
